verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, My \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, \add and\add* my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* for my sacrifices made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, \add for\add* a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto me, shall ye \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto me in their due \w season|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 28.2 \ft a sweet…: Heb. a savour of my rest\f*

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, This \add is\add* the offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* which ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w spot|strong="H8549"\w* day by \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add for\add* a \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.\f + \fr 28.3 \ft day by day: Heb. in a day\f*

The \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*;\f + \fr 28.4 \ft at even: Heb. between the two evenings\f*

And a \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \add part\add* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w beaten|strong="H3795"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\add It is\add* a \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, which was \w ordained|strong="H6213"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* for the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*: in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* shalt thou cause the strong \w wine|strong="H7941"\w* to be \w poured|strong="H5258"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* a drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

And the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: as the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and as the drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thereof, thou shalt \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w spot|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* deals of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \add for\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* thereof:

\add This is\add* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* of every \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

¶ And in the \w beginnings|strong="H7218"\w* of your \w months|strong="H2320"\w* ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w spot|strong="H8549"\w*;

And \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \add for\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*; and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* deals of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \add for\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*;

And a several tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \add for\add* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*; \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* shall be \w half|strong="H2677"\w* an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* unto a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* unto a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and a \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add part\add* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* unto a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*: this \add is\add* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* of every \w month|strong="H2320"\w* throughout the \w months|strong="H2320"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be \w offered|strong="H6213"\w*, beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

And in the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add is\add* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And in the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of this \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add is\add* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.

In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no manner of \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein:\add*

But ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: they shall be unto you without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*:

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be of\add* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*: \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* shall ye \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* for a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* for a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*;

A several tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* shalt thou \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* for \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, throughout the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*:
And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for you.

Ye shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* these beside the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, which \add is\add* for a \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

After this manner ye shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*, throughout the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, the \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* of the sacrifice made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it shall be \w offered|strong="H6213"\w* beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

And on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall have an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

¶ Also in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w*, when ye \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, after your \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \add be out\add*, ye shall have an \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w convocation|strong="H4744"\w*; ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w servile|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*:

But ye shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1241"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*;

And their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tenth \w deals|strong="H6241"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,
A several tenth \w deal|strong="H6241"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, throughout the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*;
\add And\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for you.

Ye shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \add them\add* beside the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, (they shall be unto you without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*) and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*.
